Description of incident: A Panasonic Toughbook used by              county paramedics to store patient information on ambulance runs went              missing from the WakeMed emergency department and now is thought to              have been stolen. The laptop contained names, addresses and Social              Security numbers. UPDATE             (2/7/08):              The laptop also may have the names and Social Security numbers of              emergency personnel. The number includes county paramedics,              firefighters and contracted emergency medical technicians and paramedics              from municipal agencies.
